metadata.title: CVE-2021-47207 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ALSA:gus: fix null pointer dereference on pointer block The pointer block returnfrom snd_gf1_dma_next_block could be null, so there is a potential nullpointer dereference issue. Fix this by adding a null check beforedereference.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
